Class Snake

java.lang.Object
Snake
public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the snake. We can move it with the arrows, or the WASD keys. The snake has a head and tails which are represented by DrawableUnits.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Snake​(DrawableUnit head, int windowSize, javafx.scene.Scene scene, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)

    Draws the snake on the screen

  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake​(DrawableUnit head, int windowSize, javafx.scene.Scene scene, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Constructor of the snake
      Parameters:
      head - it's the head of the snake. We can move this, and the tails will follow it
      windowSize - the current size of the window
      scene - we want to add object to this scene
      gc - the GraphicsContext that helps us draw objects on the screen
